column4: anyone here know a good VNC program for windows(yes i know this isn't a windows room) I used to use RealVNC but people said not to use it cause u can't fully un-install it
if i use tightvnc, do i need to use tightvnc on my linux? or any vnc program?
if i use tightvnc, do i need to use tightvnc on my linux? or any vnc program?
umm, anyone wanna guide me through installing and setting up a VNC program on my ubuntu machine through the console? lol
well what exactly is it you want to do?
VNC my linux from my windows
so you can view your linux display in window sor vice-versa
yea, so i can view linux from windows
ok so your running ubuntu with gnome yea. get tightvnc and run it on windows
cant remember where it is, somewhere in the system menu, i'm running xfce
then connect to your linux box from windows, the port number will be 6000
aww dam, can't do that unless i reboot it, can't reboot it cause then i won't be able to connect to IRC again lol
why do you need to reboot?
cause it's frozen on the screensaver
reboot you must do so it would seem
yeah but i can't just reboot it, it's running a IRCD linked with 2 other servers(or 1 dunno how many are up at this time) and i don't think the IRCD starts automaticly
also for some stange reason i can't connect to the other servers, so if i reboot it and the IRCD doesn't start then i'm screwed
i'm also playing irpg, so i gotta get this box onto a different server before i reboot lol
the screensaver WAS disabled, i dunno what happened! i think the patch enabled it lol
well if nothing is working then the server isn't working either
i'm connected to it, and i'm SSHing it aswell
was just gonna say ssh in and just kill xscreensaver
from the console type "sudo kill -9 `pidof xscreensaver`"
usage thing came up, are you shure that's right?
try "sudo ps x" and find the screensaver process in there
maybe it's my gfx card, cause my gfx card is stuffed lol
do you have any gui progs running that you can't lose?
then kill the x server or just try restarting it "<ctrl>+<backspace>"
as long as the ircd doesn't close i don't care what programs close
i killed Xorg but it didn't die
then try "sudo killall -15 gdm" (gdm=gnome display manager)
gave OK for both, but still screensaver on screen
tried all them, still screensaver on screen
sorry then i think i'm a little stumped
are you sure then there is no gnome-screensaver process?
if you want me to look into it more then can you set up a guest ac on your box and let me ssh in
18102 ?        Ss     0:00 /usr/lib/gdm/gdmopen -l /bin/sh -c /usr/bin/whiptail --yesno 'There already appears to be an X ser
18103 tty8     Ss+    0:00 /usr/lib/gdm/gdmopen -l /bin/sh -c /usr/bin/whiptail --yesno 'There already appears to be an X ser
really? u sound like youre not lol
